column4: i had an issue this am that when i tried to open a specfic folder on my thumb drive it would set all permissions to read only , but i could remove it and reload the drive and as long as i did not open the folder causing that was causing this everything was fine has anyone ever had this happen before ? i believe it was a corrupt file ?
What filesystem was on the thumbdrive?
i formated it hee on ubuntu fat
but when i right click on it and properties is says file sys msdos
